name: Simon Delamare
content: Simon Delamare - Homepage Simon Delamare - Homepage Welcome to my professional homepage. Personal Information I am a research engineer from CNRS, working inside the LIP laboratory at ENS Lyon. My current work is focused on large-scale and distributed computing infrastructures and their usage under various workloads (HPC, AI...). I am involved in Grid'5000 testbed as a member of the technical team.
